name: GetAvailableDocumentsForOrder
description: Returns a list of available outputs for an order by taking an `OrderID`.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

F.name: ID
F.description: ID of the Station in EVA. Can be used directly in services

F.name: Name
F.description: Name of the station for display purposes

E.name: Allowed
E.description: Allowed is false when this option cannot be used, true otherwise

E.name: Preferred
E.description: Indicates if this output should be preferred by the frontend. Can be used to, for example, set a checkbox or radio button by default so the user does not have to toggle it themselves

E.name: ReasonCode
E.description: Optional reason code that is included if Allowed is set to false

E.name: Stations
E.description: Possbile stations where the document can be output

G.name: Code
G.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

G.name: Message
G.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

G.name: RequestID
G.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

G.name: Type
G.description: A short description of the error type.

H.name: ExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

H.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
H.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

H.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

C.name: Documents
C.description:
List of order document outputs available for a specific order.
Each document contains information regarding the following categories:

`Receipt`           - physically printing the order invoice
`Paper`             - printing the order invoice on a paper printer
`Email`             - sending the order invoice by email
`Digital`           - providing a downloadable version of the order invoice
`ElectronicReceipt` - providing an electronic receipt version of the order invoice
`Metadata`          - providing information about the order invoice.

The document category contains information on whether it's available for the order
and a reason code in case it's not available.
